how_four.publish_step2: Kami akan menerbitkan aplikasi Anda di semua App Store berbeda (Apple, Android).

how_one.reg_step4: Ingat: Anda memiliki 15 hari percobaan gratis dengan tutor profesional.

how_three.tutor_step2: Dukungan professional pelanggan akan membantu Anda dengan seluruh tahapan perkembangan aplikasi Anda. Tersedia melalui obrolan, e-mail, dan saluran telepon.

how_two.app_step3: Control jumlah unduhan dan pemberitahuan push pada pelanggan Anda.

pwa.maintitle: All our Apps are Progressive Web App!
pwa.ios: How to install PWA in iOS Safari browser
pwa.android: How to install PWA in Android Chrome browser
tips: Progressive Web Apps are experiences that combine the best of the web and the best of the apps.
1. Increase their functionality, conform to the capabilities of the device on which they run, becoming more and more powerful as they are used.
2. Are built using web development standards, like HTML, CSS, javaScript and a new generation of javaScript APIs.
3. Have all the most remarkable Apps features as: can be installed on mobile devices, run offline, have apps look and feel, push notifications, etc.
